channel.title: Please help me, I am begging for you help!
channel.description: Ok, this is whats happened. I have Tos-Scape. When you die in-game, you get sent to the bank, and the items you are wearing go back into your inventory. is there ANY WAY to make it when you die, you lose ALL items? Please help me, you will be admin! Please! [br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2007, 06:02:31 PM[/size][hr]plz

item.title: Please help me, I am begging for you help!
item.dc:creator: @Zachary825 Zachary825
item.description:
@Zachary825 wrote:

[quote=“double helix, post:4, topic:52067”]Still… before you should start coding you should learn java. And that takes 2-6 months for a nice base. Else you will have to copy code from everybody and that never gives a nice game.

Anyway. Find the method where your guy dies and fill up his inventory array with nulls or zeros[/quote]
Ok, this is what i got, when i search oh dear, thease are what i get. removeAllItems(); //teleportToX = 3254; //teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

removeAllItems(); //teleportToX = 3254; //teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

removeAllItems(); //teleportToX = 3254; //teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

removeAllItems(); //teleportToX = 3254; //teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

castOnPlayer.sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); castOnPlayer.currentHealth = castOnPlayer.maxHealth;
Those are when i search for it, i get them

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me, I am begging for you help!
item.dc:creator: @double_helix double helix
item.description:
@double_helix wrote:

Still… before you should start coding you should learn java. And that takes 2-6 months for a nice base. Else you will have to copy code from everybody and that never gives a nice game.

Anyway. Find the method where your guy dies and fill up his inventory array with nulls or zeros

item.title: Please help me, I am begging for you help!
item.dc:creator: @Zachary825 Zachary825
item.description:
@Zachary825 wrote:

double helix:

Just remove them on death. You’re admin in over 30 servers, and you’re making your own. Why cant you do a simple thing like that?

Admin is not the same as coder.
How do that??
